Setup or Load REDCapSync Project

Source: R/R6-REDCapSyncProject.R
REDCapSyncProject.Rd

Project class (REDCapSync)

Main class for managing REDCap data, metadata, and sync operations.

Users should construct objects using setup_project(), not using REDCapSyncProject$new() directly.

Value

A REDCapSyncProject R6 object.

Private Methods

load(short_name)

Load project internals.

Methods

Public methods

  • REDCapSyncProject$new()

  • REDCapSyncProject$info()

  • REDCapSyncProject$add_summary()

  • REDCapSyncProject$generate_summary()

  • REDCapSyncProject$add_field()

  • REDCapSyncProject$sync()

  • REDCapSyncProject$save()

  • REDCapSyncProject$use()

Method new()

Creates a new instance of this REDCapSyncProject R6 class.

Usage

REDCapSyncProject$new(short_name)

Arguments

short_name

Character. The project short identifier.

description

short_name Character project identifier.
